Circulars for website(Cicular) 
 
RESTRICTED 
 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004-Div.I 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
‘A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN , NEW DELHI 
Date: 03/09/2008 
 
 
CIRCULAR No. 7/2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON PROTOCOL / 
SECURITY / MEDICAL GROUNDS. 
 
 
Reference BCAS Circular No. 36/2005 dated 30/8/2005 on the 
subject cited  above. 
  
Shri Ghulam Nabi Azad, former Chief Minister of Jammu & 
Kashmir is permitted  to avail  the  facility of Airport Operator’s Ferry 
vehicle up to  the aircraft during  his departure / arrival by air from /to IGI 
Airport Delhi, on the grounds of security, till further order.  
 
 
 
 
         (M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf. 
 
Copy to :  
1. MCA(Shri Gowri Shankar, U/Secretary), w.r.t. MCA letter no. AV. 
13024/36/2008-SS dated 08/08/08. 
2. MHA (Shri D. K Kotia, JS(PM), Jaisalmer House, 26,Mansingh Road,    
New Delhi, w.r.t D.O No. VI.23018/7/2005-VS dated 23/07/08
